author: @0RoseRed

text:
Not riding the bus doesn't mean you don't care about the environment. Transportation only accounts for roughly 25% of emissions in America.even if you eliminated all those emissions, it wouldn't change a single thing. We are adding to climate change, but nothing we do will prevent it from happening. We're speeding it up by maybe a few centuries. That all aside, there're ways to be carbon neutral and still drive a car, believe it or not. And they are very easy.

I drive an SUV and am completely carbon neutral. And I do it with putting my life and safety at risk. Life is not a black and white dichotomy.
author: @williameldridge9382
